about.description:
OmniSciDB is an in-memory, column store, SQL relational database
that was designed from the ground up to run on GPUs.

name: omniscidbe

    - xz
    - zlib
  run_constrained:
    - arrow-cpp-proc 3.* cuda
    - cudatoolkit >=11.0
test:
  commands:
    - test -f ${PREFIX}/lib/libDBEngine.so
    - test -f "${PREFIX}/etc/conda/activate.d/omniscidbe_activate.sh"
    - test -f "${PREFIX}/etc/conda/deactivate.d/omniscidbe_deactivate.sh"
    - 'source ${PREFIX}/etc/conda/activate.d/omniscidbe_activate.sh

      test -n "${OMNISCI_ROOT_PATH+x}"

      ldd ${PREFIX}/lib/libDBEngine.so

      '
about:
  description: 'OmniSciDB is an in-memory, column store, SQL relational database

    that was designed from the ground up to run on GPUs.

    '
  dev_url: https://github.com/omnisci/omniscidb
  doc_url: https://www.omnisci.com/docs/latest/
  home: https://www.omnisci.com/
  license: Apache-2.0
  license_family: APACHE
  license_file: LICENSE.md
  summary: The OmniSci database
extra:
  copy_test_source_files: true
  final: true
  recipe-maintainers:
    - andrewseidl
    - jclay
    - pearu
    - xmnlab

about.description:
OmniSciDB is an in-memory, column store, SQL relational database
that was designed from the ground up to run on GPUs.
